```{r counting words for observed column}
bigfoot_data_wordcount <- bigfoot_data %>%
  mutate(word_count_of_observed = str_count(observed, "\\s+") + 1)
```

```{r }
min(bigfoot_data_wordcount$word_count_of_observed)
max(bigfoot_data_wordcount$word_count_of_observed)
mean(bigfoot_data_wordcount$word_count_of_observed)
median(bigfoot_data_wordcount$word_count_of_observed)
```

```{r }
bigfoot_data_wordcount_filtered_less_200 <- bigfoot_data_wordcount %>%
  filter(word_count_of_observed < 200)

print(bigfoot_data_wordcount_filtered_less_200)
```

```{r }
write.csv(bigfoot_data_wordcount_filtered_less_200, "bigfoot_data_wordcount_filtered_less_200.csv")
```
